name: Never Alone (itch) (thea-k, Michelle Lytle)
description:
Never Alone is an abstract horror inspired game that was made for a CMPM/AGPM 120 project at UCSC. It combines elements from different horror concepts and explores what causes feelings of suspense and discomfort in people. Through the use of "vintage" (90s-early 00s era) aesthetics, we explored common superstitions and fears that were prominent in US culture at the time.

Content Warning for flashing images and eye strain.
